director.name: 伊内斯·奥利维拉 Inês Oliveira

introduction: “The Russian lady and I used to cross each other every day at 6 a.m., as every day she used to ride her bicycle to work. But that day she was on foot. The neighbor’s dogs were barking... barking and barking…”“To me, the body looked more of a sheep. I’ve seen dead bodies but that wasn’t a dead person to me.”A report by two witnesses of a hideous crime committed in the idyllic landscape of Sintra. The victim was a foreigner named Vira Chudnenko.
